inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Transbronchial biopsy revealed necrotic granulomas with multinucleated giant cells and the Wegener's granulomatosis was diagnosed for him.

notes: A 57-year-old man with newly diagnosed Granulomatosis with polyangitis, being treated with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides since 4 months ago. His Birmingham Vasculitis Activity Score (BVAS) is above 4.
